Front Desk Representative Job at Mixenz Concepts




        
    

        
        Mixenz Concepts is focused on the production of healthy drinks and parfait. We specialize in creating and serving a variety of refreshing drinks and delicious, creamy parfaits. Our offerings include smoothies, juices, cold drinks, and a range of layered parfaits made with fresh fruits, yogurt, granola, and other healthy toppings. This business emphasizes quality, freshness, and customer satisfaction, catering to health-conscious individuals and those looking for quick, nutritious snacks.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Representative
Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Keep the front desk tidy and presentable with all necessary material (pens, forms, paper etc.)
	Greet and welcome guests
	Answer questions and address complaints
	Answer all incoming calls and redirect them or keep messages
	Receive letters, packages etc. and distribute them
	Prepare outgoing mail by drafting correspondence, securing parcels etc.
	Check, sort and forward emails
	Monitor office supplies and place orders when necessary
	Keep updated records and files
	Monitor office expenses and costs
	Take up other duties as assigned (travel arrangements, schedules etc.)


Requirements


	High School diploma; additional qualifications will be a plus.
	Proven experience as front desk representative, agent or relevant position
	Familiarity with office machines (e.g. fax, printer etc.)
	Knowledge of office management and basic bookkeeping
	Proficient in English (oral and written)
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel and Word)
	Strong communication and people skills
	Good organizational and multi-tasking abilities
	Problem-solving skills
	Customer service orientation.

Sales & Marketing Executive Job at Erisco Foods Limited




        
    

        
        Erisco Foods Limited is an indigenous food product manufacturer, incorporated in Nigeria in 2004 and started operations in 2009, manufacturing Tomato Paste, Seasoning, Rice, Milk cubes and more. We are firmly committed to producing high-quality products that combine nourishment with value pricing, as they strive to become one of Nigeria’s largest indigenous foodmanufacturers on a global scale.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales & Marketing Executive 

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Sales and Marketing Executive to drive business growth in Lagos.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying new market opportunities, managing client relationships, executing sales strategies and contributing to overall brand performance in the region.


Responsibilities


	Identify and develop new business opportunities in Lagos markets to expand customer base and drive revenue growth.
	Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with key clients, wholesalers, and distributors to enhance customer loyalty and satisfaction.
	Implement sales strategies to meet and exceed assigned sales targets, ensuring consistent product availability and visibility across the territory.
	Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer behavior to provide actionable insights that support sales and marketing strategies.
	Conduct product presentations, coordinate roadshows, and participate in promotional campaigns to increase product awareness and boost sales.
	Provide accurate and timely reports on sales performance, market activities, stock levels, and customer feedback to management.
	Liaise with internal departments (e.g., logistics, customer service) to ensure timely delivery of goods and resolution of client issues.


Qualifications / Requirements


	Minimum of OND / HND / B.Sc. in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in field sales, preferably within the FMCG or food manufacturing industry.
	Strong knowledge of the Lagos market and its distribution channels.
	Excellent interpersonal, communication, and negotiation skills.
	Ability to work independently and manage time efficiently.
	Proficiency in MS Office and basic reporting tools.
	Candidate must reside in Lagos.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:: recruitment@eriscofoodsltd.com.ng using "Sales and Marketing - Executive - Lagos" as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

Facility Manager Job at Prestigious Consulting




        
    

        
        Prestigious Consulting is a professional HR consultancy firm. We focus on improving organizational performance through strategic people & process management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager

Job Location: Sangotedo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Hybrid (3 days onsite, 2 days work from home)

Job Description
     

            
    




	Respond to tenants’ inquiries and resolve complaints professionally
	Oversee maintenance issues and coordinate necessary repairs
	Monitor facility cleanliness, safety, and functionality
	Collect rent and maintain accurate payment records
	Conduct site visits three times a week, including a full inspection at least once weekly
	Maintain logs of maintenance issues, tenant communication, and property updates.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree with 1 - 3 years of experience.
	Experience in facility or property management is an advantage
	Strong communication and problem-solving skills
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple responsibilities
	Good organizational and record-keeping abilities
	Resides in or close to Sangotedo (preferred).


Salary
N100,000 Monthly

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrprestigiousconsulting@outlook.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
